articles.title: St Johnstone: Tommy Wright quits as manager after seven years
articles.description: Tommy Wright quits as St Johnstone manager after seven years in charge.
articles.content:
Tommy Wright has quit as St Johnstone manager after seven years in charge.
Wright, who still had two years of his deal to run, has been linked with the vacant Northern Ireland job.
More to follow.
